name: Down & Up (地板跳跳)
description:
The ground is upping!
Step on it and push to others!

Eat star to give opponent the red ground,
that step on will up and not down.

地面不斷在上升！
趕快把地面採回去推給別人！

吃到星星會讓對手出現紅色地面，
紅色地面踩了反而會上升。

Controll：

P1(Left)
Move: AD、Joystick
Jump: W or Space、Joystick Up or Button A

P2(Right)
Move: ←→、Joystick
Jump: ↑ or Left Ctrl、Joystick Up or Button A

Created by:
